message: Bob, I have a unique product I believe could be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1200000.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering its potential.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for offering the product. I understand its value might be subjective, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $850000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850000 is significantly below what I believe the product is worth. I'm willing to come down to $950000, reflecting the value you've identified while still ensuring I receive a fair price. This is a final offer before I explore other options.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget and valuation, I am able to offer $900000 for the product.
